articles.title: Profile of a 77-year-old Offaly parkrunner: Meet Rita
articles.description: Walsh Island woman completes 250th parkrun at Mountlucas
articles.content:
Meet Rita Corcoran, age 77 years young, from Walsh Island who recently completed her 250th parkrun at Mountlucas parkrun.
When did you complete your first parkrun?

articles.title: Israel's defence minister vows to stop aid boat carrying Greta Thunberg from reaching Gaza
articles.description: The climate campaigner is one of 12 activists aboard the vessel, which is operated by the Freedom Flotilla Coalition and aims to break Israel's sea blockade.
articles.content:
Israel's defence minister has threatened to "take whatever measures necessary" to stop an aid boat carrying Greta Thunberg from reaching Gaza.

articles.description: On the AI front, Apple is expected to let third-party developers build AI apps and features that are powered by its foundational models.

articles.title: Blues vs Bombers: Blues hang on to remain in finals hunt; star onballer facing MRO strife
articles.description: Carlton Blues play Essendon Bombers at the MCG in Melbourne in a must win AFL match for both teams with Fox Footy and Kayo Sports showing the match live at 7.20pm AEST.
articles.content:
Carlton have escaped with an eight-point victory over Essendon at the MCG on Sunday night after a mid-match collapse threatened to waste their seven-goals-to-one start.
However, the Blues’ much-needed win – 11.12 (78) to 11.4 (70) – was overshadowed ... [2505 chars]

articles.title: Scott Morrison receives country's highest honour for leading Australia through COVID crisis
articles.description: The 30th prime minister has been appointed a Companion of the Order of Australia for his "eminent service" to the country and direction during the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
Scott Morrison has credited Australians for their "courage and resilience" in the face of crises, including the Black Summer bushfires and a once-in-a-lifetime pandemic, as he receives the country's highest honour for his leadership.

articles.title: Monster black hole M87 is spinning at 80% of the cosmic speed limit - and pulling in matter even faster
articles.description: The famous black hole M87 keeps surprising us. New research calculates its spin speed to be at 80% of the theoretical limit, with matter falling into its maw even faster.
articles.content: The monster black hole lurking at the center of galaxy M87 is an absolute beast. It is one of the largest in our vicinity and was the ideal first target for the Event Horizon Telescope. Scientists have taken a fresh look at the supermassive black hol... [3279 chars]
